text_block_list.text:
It had been a few days since I saw Vivlos' mock race. 
If her dream was to race in Dubai, then I'd need to 
do some research so I could properly guide her――

So, in the past few days I was looking over her data, 
as well as her two sisters――"Verxina" and "Cheval Grand."

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
『――Well, to be honest, winning the Victoria Mile 
back-to-back brought a great sense of relief.』

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
『When pursuing the Triple Tiara, always getting 2nd…… 
after that Shuuka Sho, truthfully, was a nightmare. 
Thinking that if I had just taken one more step……』

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
『But that frustation, I believe it's what led to winning the Victoria 
Mile. And now, I can't help but feel grateful for those losses――』

Verxina……the first Uma Musume in history to win the 『Victoria M』 
consecutively. With her perseverance and earnestness, she overcame 
the frustation and achieved glory.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
Haaa……Haaa…… 
Damn, at the end, I need to be able to accelerate more……

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
……I need to work harder. 
If I don't……then I'll never be a great Uma Musume……!

Cheval Grand……since her debut, she did not have 
any notable results. However, like her older 
sister, she's earnest and has a lot of potential.

The younger sister of these two, Vivlos, had also 
inherited that talent. She's also achieved excellent 
results during her training with instructors.

If she continues to pursue her training seriously, then her 
talk about going to Dubai won't remain an impossible dream――

……for some reason she seemed to be depressed. 
Now that I think about it, I said I'd consider the 
contract on my own but, I hadn't met her since then.

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: ……I'm sorry.

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
You see……for a long time, I've been told 
『You're good at getting your way』 by everyone.

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Papa and Mama, and my older sisters were all really kind. 
They spoiled me alot……and I love them.

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Hmm-, well there were times it failed with Chevacchi though. 
But, they still showered me with lots of love.

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Toys, snacks, and friends too……even my first race. 
Everything I wanted, I'd always get it.

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
But you see, there was one thing that I wasn't given. 
And that was――my feelings for Dubai.

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
When I was a kid, my family went on vacation to Dubai. 
And it was there……that I saw a super amazing world!

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Really, it was amazing! Everything I saw sparkled, 
and it was all about Celebs! I started to 
think I really wanted to become a Celeb too!

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Definitely, we definitely have to live here, is 
what I begged my parents for but……it wasn't possible 
they said. In the end, it couldn't be granted.

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
I couldn't give it up though, and I did a lot of research 
in to Dubai. And then……I saw them. Races in Dubai……!

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
And it was just so amazing……! It was so dazzling, and I 
was mesmerized immediately! The race course, the people 
that were there, and the Uma Musume……they were all sparkly!

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
And if I were to run and win there……more so than living there, 
I'd be even more of a Celeb right? For the winners of those 
races, accessories covered in jewels matched them perfectly!

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
And at that moment, I could feel even more excitement in my chest…… 
and a new dream was born. ――That I want to win races in Dubai!

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
But……Mama and Papa, and my Onee-chans, 
all said 『You're still saying that, Vivlos~?』……

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
They don't think I'm serious. But it's true that it 
sounds like a childish dream……but I'm not messing around.

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
But I'm really serious, I want to run races in 
that sparkly place, Dubai! For that dream, 
I want to do my best. I believe I can do my best.

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Compared to my serious Onee-chans, I know that it's weird. 
But…… ……that's what my dream is.

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
……Trainer-san, 
do you think this isn't a worthwhile dream?

The reason why Vivlos seemed so depressed and why she 
started talking so much about herself……I finally realized.

She had just told me about Dubai, and I left 
without responding directly to her. She was left 
shocked and eventually came to explain herself.

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Is it really…… 
not a serious goal?
choice_data_list: No, I think it's a wonderful dream
No, I think it's a wonderful dream

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Eh……
choice_data_list: Sorry I didn't explain. You see――
Sorry I didn't explain. You see――

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
――Then, Trainer-san……does that mean you were thinking 
about how to get me to Dubai this whole time?
choice_data_list: Helping with your dream is my job

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
…… 
Does that mean you don't think it's hopeless for me?

When I rewatched video of her mock race and her 
training footage, I could feel her potential. 
With proper guidance she will continue to grow.

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
……When you put it like that…… 
Trainer-san……you're going to get my hopes up, you know?

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
That means you can see that image of 
me making it to Dubai, right? Then……

She was staring at me with eyes full of expectations. 
However, even if she wasn't 『Begging』 me, 
I had already decided to move forward――

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
I guess it's true, huh……I'm not hopeless at all. 
After all, Trainer-san said it was fine and properly understood me.

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
……Right! My eyes never deceive me after all! 
Tore-cchi, you're the best! I'm also the best~♡

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
And so, you were thinking about me the whole time, huh? 
What do I need to do to get to Dubai?

Of course, it depended mostly on her training from now on, but…… 
if there was one thing that would help right off the bat……
choice_data_list: (It caught my attention back then too)

text_block_list.name: Shop Assistant
text_block_list.text:
And so, that skirt you liked before just arrived! 
Would you like to try it on? The size is XS but……

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Thank you very much! Hmmm~ as I thought, it's 
so cute! But……looking at it, it might be too 
big. Looks like the waist will be really loose.

By no means was she too short. But on the other hand, she was very 
slender. Most likely her weight was a problem too……that's why――
choice_data_list: Let's start by getting a good meal!

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
…… 
Huh?
